pr_title: Rename OpenJ9 MethodType fields to match OpenJDK MethodType

timeline.message:
Rename OpenJ9 MethodType fields to match OpenJDK MethodType

1. "arguments" renamed to "ptypes".
2. "returnType" renamed to "rtype".

Co-authored-by: Jack Lu <Jack.S.Lu@ibm.com>
Signed-off-by: Babneet Singh <sbabneet@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Could you keep the string indentation consistent with the surrounding code please?
timeline.author: 0xdaryl

replies.bodyText: Yes, the indentation has been fixed.
